data.title: Aiadmk Founder Mg Ramachandran: Latest News, Photos, Videos on Aiadmk Founder Mg Ramachandran
meta_keywords: Aiadmk Founder Mg Ramachandran videos Aiadmk Founder Mg Ramachandran photos Aiadmk Founder Mg Ramachandran latest updates
data.meta_description: Find Aiadmk Founder Mg Ramachandran Latest News, Videos & Pictures on Aiadmk Founder Mg Ramachandran and see latest updates, news, information from NDTV.COM. Explore more on Aiadmk Founder Mg Ramachandran.
data.text:
All

News

Videos

'Aiadmk Founder Mg Ramachandran' - 20 News Result(s)

India News | Press Trust of India | Friday November 26, 2021

AIADMK founder MG Ramachandran's niece Leelavathi died on Friday following a brief illness, the party said.

www.ndtv.com

Tamil Nadu News | ANI | Tuesday February 9, 2021

Expelled AIADMK leader VK Sasikala on Tuesday reached Chennai where she visited party founder MG Ramachandran's house and paid floral tributes.

www.ndtv.com

India News | Press Trust of India | Sunday January 17, 2021

Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday paid tributes to AIADMK founder and former Tamil Nadu chief minister MG Ramachandran on his birth anniversary and lauded his efforts towards poverty alleviation and emphasis on women empowerment.

www.ndtv.com

Tamil Nadu News | Press Trust of India | Sunday December 20, 2020

Makkal Needhi Maiam (MNM) founder Kamal Haasan on Sunday yet again joined issue with the ruling AIADMK over late Chief Minister MG Ramachandran's (MGR) legacy, saying anyone who had ideals like the stalwart could be his "heir".

www.ndtv.com

Tamil Nadu News | Reported by J Sam Daniel Stalin, Edited by Deepshikha Ghosh | Friday November 13, 2020

Days after its defiant "vetrivel yatra" in Tamil Nadu, the BJP has given the state's ruling AIADMK, its ally, more reason for angst. The party is reportedly upset about the BJP using its iconic founder MG Ramachandran alongside Prime Minister Narendra Modi in a campaign video.

www.ndtv.com

South | Press Trust of India | Wednesday July 15, 2020

Slain sandalwood smuggler Veerappan's daughter Vidhya Rani, family of late Chief Minister MG Ramachandran and film personalities were among those appointed to Tamil Nadu BJP's state executive committee and various cells on Wednesday.

www.ndtv.com

Tamil Nadu News | Press Trust of India | Wednesday January 9, 2019

The Madras High Court today permitted the Tamil Nadu government to unveil the newly constructed MGR centenary arch in Chennai, proposed to commemorate the birth centenary of late chief minister and ruling AIADMK founder MG Ramachandran.

www.ndtv.com

Chennai News | Press Trust of India | Sunday September 30, 2018

The Madras High Court today directed removal of all unauthorised banners erected across the city in connection with the valedictory function of the centenary celebrations of ruling AIADMK founder and late chief minister M G Ramachandran, hours ahead of the event.

www.ndtv.com

Tamil Nadu News | Press Trust of India | Sunday December 24, 2017

AIADMK leaders O Panneerselvam and E Palaniswami today paid homage to party founder, late Chief Minister M G Ramachandran on his 30th death anniversary.

www.ndtv.com

Tamil Nadu News | Press Trust of India | Thursday September 28, 2017

The Madras High Court on Tuesday directed the Tamil Nadu government not to force school children to attend the state-sponsored birth centenary functions of ruling AIADMK founder late MG Ramachandran.

www.ndtv.com

Tamil Nadu News | Written by J Sam Daniel Stalin | Wednesday September 27, 2017

Schoolchildren cannot be forced to participate in the birth centenary events of AIADMK's founder MG Ramachandran, the Madras High Court has told the authorities in Tamil Nadu

www.ndtv.com

Tamil Nadu News | Press Trust of India | Wednesday July 26, 2017

The government will issue a commemorative coin in memory of AIADMK founder MG Ramachandran, coinciding with his birth centenary, former Tamil Nadu Chief Minister O Panneerselvam said today

www.ndtv.com

Tamil Nadu News | Press Trust of India | Wednesday June 28, 2017

The Tamil Nadu government today announced establishing an arch in memory of the late Chief Minister and AIADMK founder MG Ramachandran on the occasion of his birth centenary in Chennai. The government also decided to create a grand memorial for the late J Jayalalithaa, who died last year.

www.ndtv.com

Tamil Nadu News | Press Trust of India | Thursday March 23, 2017

The 'hat' symbol allotted to the VK Sasikala faction of the AIADMK will help attract voters as they could associate it with party founder MG Ramachandran who was known to sport the accessory, Lok Sabha Deputy Speaker M Thambidurai today said.

www.ndtv.com

Tamil Nadu News | Press Trust of India | Saturday January 14, 2017

The Tamil Nadu government on Friday declared former Chief Minister and AIADMK founder MG Ramachandran's birth centenary on January 17 as a public holiday for the State.

www.ndtv.com
